reviews.title: What Our Users Say
reviews.no_reviews: No reviews available at the moment.

items.name: Tulin Cosgun
items.text: Thanks to this application I was able to create my resume without spelling mistakes and well structured. This allowed me to apply for several positions.

items.name: Moumen
items.text: CV.fr helped me write a professional-looking resume. In addition, it has many features that made writing it easier. It also allowed me to highlight the essential points. It also has many templates to choose from to suit your taste. It also offers a cover letter template, job offers, and tracking of your application. In short, this tool is complete and I highly recommend it.

items.name: Jean-Philippe Becking
items.text: Easy to use, very good CV selection and as a result I was able to validate a training course.

items.name: Marie Laurent
items.text: An excellent platform for creating your professional resume. Intuitive interface and impressive results.

items.name: Thomas Dubois
items.text: Very satisfied with the service. The templates are modern and easy to customize.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.moreQuestions: Do you have questions? Check our

faq1.question: What is a CV?
faq1.answer: CV (Curriculum Vitae) means "course of life" in Latin. It's a poetic way to describe "the file containing all the information about a candidate's civil status, diplomas, professional experience, etc.", according to the definition of the French Larousse dictionary.

faq2.question: What to include in a CV?
faq2.answer: A CV should contain your personal details and contact information, personal profile, education, work experience, skills, foreign languages, and interests. You can also add extracurricular activities, courses, internships, objectives, and references.

faq3.question: How to create a CV?
faq3.answer: To create a CV, you have two options: use a CV generator that offers you a ready-made document with a pre-designed template, or create your CV from scratch starting with a blank page using a word processor.

faq4.question: How to create a CV using a generator?
faq4.answer: Simply browse through the different templates available, choose one that corresponds to the image you want to project, then use the CV designer to complete the different sections according to your profile.

faq5.question: What are the advantages of a CV generator?
faq5.answer: The advantages of a CV generator include time savings, ensuring you don't omit any important sections, maintaining layout integrity, ease of updating, and the ability to save in PDF format.

faq6.question: Tips for creating a good CV
faq6.answer: To create a good CV, organize it into clear sections, write concisely, avoid too much information, limit it to two pages maximum, and stay positive by highlighting your strengths.

introduction.onlinead: Response to an online job posting
introduction.onlinead_template: In response to your advertisement posted on [Site] for the position of [Poste], I am submitting my application with great interest.
introduction.spontaneous_template: I am pleased to submit my spontaneous application for a [Poste] position within your company.
introduction.printad: Response to an advertisement in a newspaper or magazine
introduction.printad_template: Following your advertisement published in [Journal/Magazine] on [Date] for the position of [Poste], I am presenting my application.
introduction.replace_instruction: Replace the elements in brackets with your information:

online.site: [Site]: The website where the ad was posted

current_situation.employed_template: I am currently working as [Poste actuel] at [Entreprise] in [Ville]. In this role, I am responsible for [Responsabilités].
current_situation.employed_graduated: I am currently employed and recently completed my studies
current_situation.employed_graduate_template: I am currently working as [Poste actuel] at [Entreprise] in [Ville]. In this role, I am responsible for [Responsabilités]. I completed my studies in [Formation] at [Établissement].
current_situation.employed_experience: I am currently employed with extensive experience
current_situation.employed_experienced_template: I am currently working as [Poste actuel] at [Entreprise] in [Ville]. With [X] years of experience in [Domaine], I have developed strong expertise in [Compétences clés].
current_situation.graduate_template: I recently completed my studies in [Formation] at [Établissement], where I gained solid knowledge in [Domaines d'expertise].
current_situation.student_template: I am currently in [Année/Niveau] of [Formation] at [Établissement], specializing in [Spécialisation].
current_situation.unemployed_template: Following [Raison], I am actively seeking a new professional challenge where I can leverage my skills in [Compétences].
current_situation.replace_instruction: Replace the elements in brackets with your information:

motivation.career_template: Your company represents a unique opportunity for my professional development. I am particularly interested in [Aspect spécifique] and wish to contribute my skills in [Compétences clés] to your team. My experience in [Domaine d'expertise] will enable me to make a significant contribution to [Projets/Objectifs de l'entreprise].
motivation.education_template: My training in [Formation] has equipped me with strong knowledge in [Domaines d'expertise], which I am eager to apply within your company. The projects I completed during my studies, notably [Projet clé], have prepared me for the challenges of this position.
motivation.experience_template: With [X] years of experience in [Secteur], I have developed deep expertise in [Compétences spécifiques]. These skills, combined with my knowledge of [Secteur d'activité], will be valuable assets in contributing to [Objectifs/Projets de l'entreprise].
motivation.company_template: Your company stands out for [Caractéristique/Valeur de l'entreprise], which aligns perfectly with my professional vision. I am particularly impressed by [Réalisation/Projet de l'entreprise] and wish to actively contribute to your future successes by bringing [Compétences/Expertise].
motivation.innovation_template: With innovation at the core of my interests, I am excited by [Projet/Technologie innovante] developed by your company. My experience in [Domaine technique/Innovation] and my ability to [Compétence spécifique] will allow me to effectively contribute to your innovative projects.
motivation.replace_instruction: Replace the elements in brackets with your information:

career.aspect_specifique: [Aspect spécifique]: A specific aspect of the company that interests you
career.projets_objectifs: [Projets/Objectifs de l'entreprise]: The company's projects or goals you wish to contribute to

education.projet_cle: [Projet clé]: A significant project from your studies

experience.competences_specifiques: [Compétences spécifiques]: Your technical or professional skills
experience.objectifs_projets: [Objectifs/Projets de l'entreprise]: The company's goals or projects

company.caracteristique_valeur: [Caractéristique/Valeur de l'entreprise]: A distinctive feature or value of the company
company.realisation_projet: [Réalisation/Projet de l'entreprise]: An achievement or project of the company

innovation.projet_technologie: [Projet/Technologie innovante]: A project or innovative technology of the company
innovation.domaine_technique: [Domaine technique/Innovation]: Your technical or innovation field

conclusion.job_offer_template:
I would like to further explain my motivation for the [Emploi recherché] position during an interview. You can reach me by phone at [Téléphone] or by email at [Adresse e-mail].

Thank you in advance for considering my application.

Sincerely,

[Prénom] [Nom]

Attachment: CV

Sincerely,

Attachment: CV

Thank you in advance for considering my application.

Sincerely,

[Prénom] [Nom]

Attachment: CV
conclusion.referral_template:

Thank you in advance for considering my application.

Sincerely,

[Prénom] [Nom]

Attachment: CV
conclusion.replace_instruction: Replace the elements in brackets with your information:

job_offer.emploi_recherche: [Emploi recherché]: The position you are applying for

sections.introduction: I am writing to express my interest in the [Position] position at your company. Having discovered your job posting on [Platform], I would like to submit my application.
sections.currentSituation: Currently working as a [Current Position] at [Company] in [City], I am responsible for [Responsibilities]. This experience has allowed me to develop strong skills in [Key Skills].
sections.motivation: Your company particularly interests me because of [Specific Aspect]. My skills in [Key Skills] and expertise in [Field of Expertise] would be valuable assets in contributing to [Company Projects/Goals].
sections.conclusion: I would welcome the opportunity to discuss my application in more detail during an interview. Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to your response.
